channel.title: Product Portfolio on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Product Portfolio on FinanClub

item.title: ROIV
item.description: score:8 Chances: Roivant Sciences Ltd. has shown promising results with its product portfolio, including IMVT-1402 and other medications The appointment of Mayukh Sukhatme, M.D., to its Board of Directors signals a positive addition to the company’s leadership Risks: The failure of oral brepocitinib to meet its primary endpoint for Systemic Lupus Erythematosus is a setback for the company Roivant’s decision to sell Telavant for $7.
